commented_code:
+# This workflow tests bun-release's code and the packages to ensure that npm,
+# yarn, and pnpm can install bun on all platforms. This does not test that bun
+# itself works as it hardcodes 1.1.0 as the version to package.
+name: bun-release-test
+concurrency: release-test
+
+on:
+  pull_request:
+    paths:
+      - "packages/bun-release/**"
+      - ".github/workflows/bun-release-test.yml"

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,46 @@
+# This workflow tests bun-release's code and the packages to ensure that npm,
+# yarn, and pnpm can install bun on all platforms. This does not test that bun
+# itself works as it hardcodes 1.1.0 as the version to package.
+name: bun-release-test
+concurrency: release-test
+
+on:
+  pull_request:
+    paths:
+      - "packages/bun-release/**"
+      - ".github/workflows/bun-release-test.yml"
discussion_comments.comment_body:
The file extension in the path doesn't match the actual filename. The workflow is looking for changes to `.github/workflows/bun-release-test.yml` but the file being created has a `.yaml` extension. This mismatch will prevent the workflow from triggering when the workflow file itself is modified. Either change the path in the `paths` section to use `.yaml` or rename the file to use the `.yml` extension. ```suggestion - ".github/workflows/bun-release-test.yaml" ``` *Spotted by [Diamond](https://app.graphite.dev/diamond/?org=oven-sh&ref=ai-review-comment)*

Is this helpful? React 👍 or 👎 to let us know.

commented_code:
commit-message: "deps: update sqlite to ${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}"
           title: "deps: update sqlite to ${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}"
           delete-branch: true
-          branch: deps/update-sqlite-${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}
+          branch: deps/update-sqlite
+          lables: "automation"

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -100,7 +100,8 @@ jobs:
           commit-message: "deps: update sqlite to ${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}"
           title: "deps: update sqlite to ${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}"
           delete-branch: true
-          branch: deps/update-sqlite-${{ steps.check-version.outputs.latest }}
+          branch: deps/update-sqlite
+          lables: "automation"
discussion_comments.comment_body:
There's a typo in the property name in the SQLite update workflow: `lables` should be `labels`. This will prevent the automation label from being applied correctly to pull requests created by this workflow. ```suggestion labels: "automation" ``` *Spotted by [Diamond](https://app.graphite.dev/diamond/?org=oven-sh&ref=ai-review-comment)*

Is this helpful? React 👍 or 👎 to let us know.
